tokens: chapter 4
sent_text: Chapter 4 .

tokens: cause-01 learn-01 i fact ordinal-entity 2 important great large more any scarce house planet come-01 prince little
sent_text: I had thus learned a second fact of great importance : this was that the planet the little prince came from was scarcely any larger than a house !

tokens: contrast-01 surprise-01 - that i much real-04
sent_text: But that did not really surprise me much .

tokens: know-01 i exist-01 and planet great planet Earth name Earth planet Jupiter name Jupiter planet Mars name Mars planet Venus name Venus name-01 we planet include-91 planet small so cause-01 difficult see-01 planet telescope other multiple 100 also well very
sent_text: I knew very well that in addition to the great planets -- such as the Earth , Jupiter , Mars , Venus -- to which we have given names , there are also hundreds of others , some of which are so small that one has a hard time seeing them through the telescope .

tokens: give-01 astronomer number thing 1 include-91 this only discover-01 astronomer thing instead-of-91 name-01 astronomer thing
sent_text: When an astronomer discovers one of these he does not give it a name , but only a number .

tokens: possible-01 call-01 he it name Asteroid 325 exemplify-01
sent_text: He might call it , for example , " Asteroid 325 . "

tokens: cause-01 reason serious-02 believe-01 i come-01 prince little asteroid - name B-612 planet
sent_text: I have serious reason to believe that the planet from which the little prince came is the asteroid known as B-612 .

tokens: see-01 asteroid this telescope have-frequency-91 1 only
sent_text: This asteroid has only once been seen through the telescope .

tokens: see-01 astronomer country Turkey name Turkey date-entity 1909
sent_text: That was by a Turkish astronomer , in 1909 .

tokens: present-01 a it organization International_Astronautical_Congress name International Astronomical Congress demonstrate-01 a great discover-01 astronomer
sent_text: On making his discovery , the astronomer had presented it to the International Astronomical Congress , in a great demonstration .

tokens: contrast-01 costume-01 he country Turkey name Turkey cause-01 believe-01 somebody - thing say-01 he
sent_text: But he was in Turkish costume , and so nobody would believe what he said .

tokens: resemble-01 grown-up that
sent_text: Grown - ups are like that ...

tokens: contrast-01 make-01 person have-org-role-91 country Turkey name Turkey dictator law change-01 subject person costume continent Europe name Europe threaten-01 dictator penalize-01 subject die-01 subject subject fortunate-01 reputation planet - name Asteroid B-612
sent_text: Fortunately , however , for the reputation of Asteroid B-612 , a Turkish dictator made a law that his subjects , under pain of death , should change to European costume .

tokens: cause-01 demonstrate-01 astronomer dress-01 and style elegance impress-01 date-entity 1920 again all-over
sent_text: So in 1920 the astronomer gave his demonstration all over again , dressed with impressive style and elegance .

tokens: and accept-01 everybody thing report-01 he time this
sent_text: And this time everybody accepted his report .

tokens: account-01 a3 and grown-up way grown-up and tell-01 i detail this asteroid you note-01 i number asteroid you
sent_text: If I have told you these details about the asteroid , and made a note of its number for you , it is on account of the grown - ups and their ways .

tokens: question-01 - they matter essential you tell-01 you make-01 you have-rel-role-91 person you friend new-01 they ever any
sent_text: WHen you tell them that you have made a new friend , they never ask you any questions about essential matters .

tokens: say-01 they sound-01 voice he amr-unknown you ever -
sent_text: They never say to you , " What does his voice sound like ?

tokens: love-01 he amr-unknown game good most
sent_text: What games does he love best ?

tokens: collect-01 he butterfly interrogative
sent_text: Does he collect butterflies ? "

tokens: demand-01 they age-01 he amr-unknown instead-of-91
sent_text: Instead , they demand : " How old is he ?

tokens: have-rel-role-91 person amr-unknown he brother
sent_text: How many brothers has he ?

tokens: weigh-01 he amr-unknown
sent_text: How much does he weigh ?

tokens: make-05 person have-rel-role-91 he father monetary-quantity amr-unknown
sent_text: How much money does his father make ? "

tokens: think-01 they learn-01 they anything he figure this only
sent_text: Only from these figures do they think they have learned anything about him .

tokens: possible-01 - get-01 g2 idea any at all h2 say-01 you see-01 you house make-01 brick rosy and geranium window dove roof beautiful-02 grown-up
sent_text: If you were to say to the grown - ups : " I saw a beautiful house made of rosy brick , with geraniums in the windows and doves on the roof , " they would not be able to get any idea of that house at all .

tokens: obligate-01 y say-01 you see-01 y house cost-01 monetary-quantity dollar 20000 they
sent_text: You would have to say to them : " I saw a house that cost $ 20,000 . "

tokens: exclaim-01 they pretty house that then
sent_text: Then they would exclaim : " Oh , what a pretty house that is ! "

tokens: possible-01 say-01 you prove-01 and charming he laugh-01 he look-01 he sheep exist-01 prince little they just-so
sent_text: Just so , you might say to them : " The proof that the little prince existed is that he was charming , that he laughed , and that he was looking for a sheep .

tokens: prove-01 want-01 anybody sheep exist-01 anybody
sent_text: If anybody wants a sheep , that is a proof that he exists . "

tokens: and do-02 tell-01 that they good-04 they amr-unknown
sent_text: And what good would it do to tell them that ?

tokens: and shrug-01 they shoulder they treat-01 they you child
sent_text: They would shrug their shoulders , and treat you like a child .

tokens: contrast-01 and convince-01 they leave-14 they peace question-01 - they y say-01 you come-01 he planet - name Asteroid B-612 they
sent_text: But if you said to them : " The planet he came from is Asteroid B-612 , " then they would be convinced , and leave you in peace from their questions .

tokens: resemble-01 they that
sent_text: They are like that .

tokens: obligate-01 one hold-01 - one it against they
sent_text: One must not hold it against them .

tokens: recommend-01 show-01 child forbearance great grown-up always
sent_text: Children should always show great forbearance toward grown - up people .

tokens: contrast-01 certain indifferent-01 we understand-01 life figure
sent_text: But certainly , for us who understand life , figures are a matter of indifference .

tokens: like-02 i begin-01 i story this fashion tale fairy
sent_text: I should have liked to begin this story in the fashion of the fairy - tales .

tokens: like-02 i say-01 i prince little live-01 planet big more scarce prince need-01 sheep once-upon-a-time
sent_text: I should have like to say : " Once upon a time there was a little prince who lived on a planet that was scarcely any bigger than himself , and who had need of a sheep ... "

tokens: give-01 that truth air great more much story i person understand-01 life
sent_text: To those who understand life , that would have given a much greater air of truth to my story .

tokens: cause-01 want-01 i read-01 anyone book i careless -
sent_text: For I do not want any one to read my book carelessly .

tokens: suffer-01 i grief much too set-down-09 i memory this
sent_text: I have suffered too much grief in setting down these memories .

tokens: go-02 person have-rel-role-91 i friend away i sheep person before now temporal-quantity 6 year already
sent_text: Six years have already passed since my friend went away from me , with his sheep .

tokens: ensure-01 forget-01 i he - try-01 i describe-01 i he here
sent_text: If I try to describe him here , it is to make sure that I shall not forget him .

tokens: sad-02 forget-01 person have-rel-role-91 friend
sent_text: To forget a friend is sad .

tokens: have-03 - everyone person have-rel-role-91 everyone friend
sent_text: Not every one has had a friend .

tokens: and possible-01 resemble-01 i grown-up interest-01 - anything except-01 figure forget-01 i he
sent_text: And if I forget him , I may become like the grown - ups who are no longer interested in anything but figures ...

tokens: buy-01 i and paint box pencil some that
sent_text: It is for that purpose , again , that I have bought a box of paints and some pencils .

tokens: hard-02 take-up-31 i temporal-quantity make-01 - picture any except-01 and picture boa constrictor from outside picture boa constrictor from inside ever since age-01 i temporal-quantity 6 year draw-01 again cause-01
sent_text: It is hard to take up drawing again at my age , when I have never made any pictures except those of the boa constrictor from the outside and the boa constrictor from the inside , since I was six .

tokens: try-01 i make-02 i true-02 portrait i life most possible-01 certain
sent_text: I shall certainly try to make my portraits as true to life as possible .

tokens: contrast-01 sure-02 - i at all succeed-01 i
sent_text: But I am not at all sure of success .

tokens: and go-06 picture 1 draw-01 along all-right resemble-01 - picture draw-01 another subject picture
sent_text: One drawing goes along all right , and another has no resemblance to its subject .

tokens: err-01 i high-02 prince little too and tall prince too place one short-07 prince too place another some
sent_text: I make some errors , too , in the little prince 's height : in one place he is too tall and in another too short .

tokens: and feel-01 i doubt-01 i color costume he some
sent_text: And I feel some doubts about the color of his costume .

tokens: cause-01 fumble-01 i along good-03 most good-03 now bad-02 now fair-04 general-02 hope-01 i middling possible-01
sent_text: So I fumble along as best I can , now good , now bad , and I hope generally fair - to - middling .

tokens: mistake-02 i detail important more certain also
sent_text: In certain more important details I shall make mistakes , also .

tokens: contrast-01 fault-01 i something that -
sent_text: But that is something that will not be my fault .

tokens: explain-01 - person have-rel-role-91 i friend anything i ever
sent_text: My friend never explained anything to me .

tokens: think-01 he resemble-01 i he perhaps
sent_text: He thought , perhaps , that I was like himself .

tokens: contrast-01 know-01 - i thing see-01 sheep through wall box alas
sent_text: But I , alas , do not know how to see sheep through the walls of boxes .

tokens: resemble-01 i grown-up perhaps little
sent_text: Perhaps I am a little like the grown - ups .

tokens: obligate-01 i grow-02 i old
sent_text: I have had to grow old .

tokens: chapter 5
sent_text: Chapter 5 .

tokens: learn-01 i and something planet prince little depart-01 prince planet journey-01 prince pass-03 day each talk-01 we
sent_text: As each day passed I would learn , in our talk , something about the little prince 's planet , his departure from it , his journey .

tokens: come-01 information slow-05 very fall-01 information thing think-01 he chance-01
sent_text: The information would come very slowly , as it might chance to fall from his thoughts .

tokens: hear-01 i catastrophe baobab this day ordinal-entity 3
sent_text: It was in this way that I heard , on the third day , about the catastrophe of the baobabs .

tokens: obligate-01 thank-01 i sheep it time this again 1
sent_text: This time , once more , I had the sheep to thank for it .

tokens: ask-01 prince little true-01 eat-01 sheep bush little request-confirmation-91 prince i2 i abrupt seize-01 doubt-01 prince grave prince
sent_text: For the little prince asked me abruptly -- as if seized by a grave doubt -- " It is true , is n't it , that sheep eat little bushes ? "

tokens: true-01 that
sent_text: " Yes , that is true . "

tokens: ah expressive
sent_text: " Ah !

tokens: glad-02 i
sent_text: I am glad ! "

tokens: understand-01 - i important so recommend-01 eat-01 sheep bush little cause-01 amr-unknown
sent_text: I did not understand why it was so important that sheep should eat little bushes .

tokens: contrast-01 add-01 prince little follow-05 interrogative eat-01 they baobab also have-condition-91
sent_text: But the little prince added : " Then it follows that they also eat baobabs ? "

tokens: point-out-02 i and tree big castle equal baobab instead-of-91 bush little baobab eat-up-02 - h baobab 1 single-02 even-if take-01 p herd elephant whole away prince little
sent_text: I pointed out to the little prince that baobabs were not little bushes , but , on the contrary , trees as big as castles ; and that even if he took a whole herd of elephants away with him , the herd would not eat up one single baobab .

tokens: make-02 idea herd elephant laugh-01 prince little
sent_text: The idea of the herd of elephants made the little prince laugh .

tokens: say-01 he obligate-01 stack-01 we they
sent_text: " We would have to put them one on top of the other , " he said .

tokens: contrast-01 comment-01 he start-out-05 baobab little before grow-02 baobab big so wise
sent_text: But he made a wise comment : " Before they grow so big , the baobabs start out by being little . "

tokens: correct-02 that strict
sent_text: " That is strictly correct , "

tokens: say-01 i
sent_text: I said .

tokens: contrast-01 cause-01 amr-unknown want-01 you eat-01 sheep baobab little
sent_text: " But why do you want the sheep to eat the little baobabs ? "

tokens: answer-01 he i come-on-25 immediate speak-01 he something evidence-01 something
sent_text: He answered me at once , " Oh , come , come ! " , as if he were speaking of something that was self - evident .

tokens: and oblige-02 effort-01 i solve-01 i problem this assist-01 - i mental great
sent_text: And I was obliged to make a great mental effort to solve this problem , without any assistance .

tokens: be-located-at-91 and plant good-02 plant bad-07 indeed and planet live-01 prince little planet all learn-01 i
sent_text: Indeed , as I learned , there were on the planet where the little prince lived -- as on all planets -- good plants and bad plants .

tokens: and seed good-02 plant good-02 seed bad-07 plant bad-07 cause-01
sent_text: In consequence , there were good seeds from good plants , and bad seeds from bad plants .

tokens: contrast-01 possible-01 - see-01 seed
sent_text: But seeds are invisible .

tokens: sleep-01 they heart deep-02 darkness earth until seize-01 desire-01 wake-01 sleep-01 someone include-91 they
sent_text: They sleep deep in the heart of the earth 's darkness , until some one among them is seized with the desire to awaken .

tokens: and stretch-01 seed little this seed begin-01 seed push-01 seed sprig little charm-01 upward sun offensive - timid at-first then
sent_text: Then this little seed will stretch itself and begin -- timidly at first -- to push a charming little sprig inoffensively upward toward the sun .

tokens: allow-01 one grow-01 i wish-01 i possible-01 or sprout radish sprig bush rose only it
sent_text: If it is only a sprout of radish or the sprig of a rose - bush , one would let it grow wherever it might wish .

tokens: contrast-01 obligate-01 destroy-01 one i2 instant recognize-01 one i2 ordinal-entity 1 very soon most possible-01 destroy-01 plant bad-07 it
sent_text: But when it is a bad plant , one must destroy it as soon as possible , the very first instant that one recognizes it .

tokens: be-located-at-91 seed terrible-01 some baobab planet home prince little now
sent_text: Now there were some terrible seeds on the planet that was the home of the little prince ; and these were the seeds of the baobab .

tokens: infest-01 soil planet that they
sent_text: The soil of that planet was infested with them .

tokens: possible-01 - eliminate-01 you baobab ever attend-02 you baobab late too
sent_text: A baobab is something you will never , never be able to get rid of if you attend to it too late .

tokens: spread-01 it planet entire
sent_text: It spreads over the entire planet .

tokens: bore-01 it through it clear-03 root it
sent_text: It bores clear through it with its roots .

tokens: and split-01 b p2 piece and small too planet baobab many too
sent_text: And if the planet is too small , and the baobabs are too many , they split it in pieces ...

tokens: say-01 prince little question discipline it i late more
sent_text: " It is a question of discipline , " the little prince said to me later on .

tokens: attend-02 you toilet planet y resemble-01 t care-04 great most finish-01 you toilet y date-entity morning
sent_text: " When you 've finished your own toilet in the morning , then it is time to attend to the toilet of your planet , just so , with the greatest care .

tokens: obligate-01 pull-01 you baobab all regular-02 moment ordinal-entity 1 very possible-01 distinguish-01 baobab rosebush resemble-01 baobab close-10 so early youth baobab most
sent_text: You must see to it that you pull up regularly all the baobabs , at the very first moment when they can be distinguished from the rosebushes which they resemble so closely in their earliest youth .

tokens: add-01 prince little contrast-01 tedious very work-01 easy-05 very work-01
sent_text: It is very tedious work , " the little prince added , " but very easy . "

tokens: and say-01 he recommend-01 he draw-01 i picture beautiful-02 possible-01 see-01 child live-01 i this all exact i i day one
sent_text: And one day he said to me : " You ought to make a beautiful drawing , so that the children where you live can see exactly how all this is .

tokens: useful-05 they that very travel-01 they day some
sent_text: That would be very useful to them if they were to travel some day .

tokens: add-01 he harm-01 - put-off-06 thing work-01 piece day another sometimes
sent_text: Sometimes , " he added , " there is no harm in putting off a piece of work until another day .

tokens: contrast-01 mean-01 that catastrophe always baobab
sent_text: But when it is a matter of baobabs , that always means a catastrophe .

tokens: know-02 i planet inhabit-01 man lazy
sent_text: I knew a planet that was inhabited by a lazy man .

tokens: neglect-01 he bush little 3
sent_text: He neglected three little bushes ... "

tokens: draw-01 i planet that describe-01 prince little planet i cause-01
sent_text: So , as the little prince described it to me , I have made a drawing of that planet .

tokens: like-01 - i take-01 i tone moralist much
sent_text: I do not much like to take the tone of a moralist .

tokens: contrast-01 cause-01 and understand-01 danger baobab little so risk-01 anyone lose-02 asteroid possible-01 considerable such break-away-14 i reserve i for-once
sent_text: But the danger of the baobabs is so little understood , and such considerable risks would be run by anyone who might get lost on an asteroid , that for once I am breaking through my reserve .

tokens: child
sent_text: " Children , "

tokens: say-01 i watch-out-02 imperative you baobab plain
sent_text: I say plainly , " watch out for the baobabs ! "

tokens: cause-01 skirt-02 and person have-rel-role-91 i friend i danger this know-01 - person ever long-03 work-01 i picture draw-01 this hard-02 so person
sent_text: My friends , like myself , have been skirting this danger for a long time , without ever knowing it ; and so it is for them that I have worked so hard over this drawing .

tokens: worth-02 lesson pass-on-09 i this trouble cost-01 lesson i all
sent_text: The lesson which I pass on by this means is worth all the trouble it has cost me .

tokens: possible-01 ask-01 you picture - draw-01 other book this magnificent equal picture draw-01 this baobab impress-01 equal picture cause-01 amr-unknown i
sent_text: Perhaps you will ask me , " Why are there no other drawing in this book as magnificent and impressive as this drawing of the baobabs ? "

tokens: simple-02 thing reply-01
sent_text: The reply is simple .

tokens: try-01 i
sent_text: I have tried .

tokens: contrast-01 succeed-01 - i other
sent_text: But with the others I have not been successful .

tokens: carry-01 force-01 necessity urgent inspire-01 i beyond i draw-01 i baobab
sent_text: When I made the drawing of the baobabs I was carried beyond myself by the inspiring force of urgent necessity .

tokens: chapter 6
sent_text: Chapter 6 .

tokens: prince little
sent_text: Oh , little prince !

tokens: understand-01 i secret life you little sad-02 bit-by-bit
sent_text: Bit by bit I came to understand the secrets of your sad little life ...

tokens: find-01 you entertain-01 look-01 you sunset pleasure quiet-04 you only long-03
sent_text: For a long time you had found your only entertainment in the quiet pleasure of looking at the sunset .

tokens: learn-01 i detail new-01 that date-entity morning day ordinal-entity 4 say-01 you like-01 you sunset very i
sent_text: I learned that new detail on the morning of the fourth day , when you said to me : " I am very fond of sunsets .

tokens: and come-01 imperative you go-05 imperative w look-01 we sunset now
sent_text: Come , let us go look at a sunset now . "

tokens: contrast-01 obligate-01 wait-01 we
sent_text: " But we must wait , "

tokens: say-01 i
sent_text: I said .

tokens: wait-01 interrogative
sent_text: " Wait ?

tokens: wait-01 amr-unknown
sent_text: For what ? "

tokens: wait-01 sunset
sent_text: " For the sunset .

tokens: obligate-01 wait-01 we until time
sent_text: We must wait until it is time . "

tokens: seem-01 surprise-01 you much very at-first
sent_text: At first you seemed to be very much surprised .

tokens: and laugh-01 you you then
sent_text: And then you laughed to yourself .

tokens: say-01 you think-01 you be-located-at-91 you home always i
sent_text: You said to me : " I am always thinking that I am at home ! "

tokens: so just
sent_text: Just so .

tokens: know-01 everybody set-11 sun country France name France date-entity 12:00 country United_States name United States
sent_text: Everybody knows that when it is noon in the United States the sun is setting over France .

tokens: possible-01 go-02 y date-entity 12:00 sunset straight-04 possible-01 fly-01 you temporal-quantity 1 minute country France name France
sent_text: If you could fly to France in one minute , you could go straight into the sunset , right from noon .

tokens: fortunate-01 - be-located-at-91 country France name France away far too that
sent_text: Unfortunately , France is too far away for that .

tokens: say-01 contrast-01 obligate-01 move-01 p2 chair p2 step few only planet tiny prince little i p2
sent_text: But on your tiny planet , my little prince , all you need do is move your chair a few steps .

tokens: possible-01 see-01 you and end-01 day fall-04 twilight like-02 you see-01 any
sent_text: You can see the day end and the twilight falling whenever you like ...

tokens: say-01 you see-01 44 you sunset day one i
sent_text: " One day , " you said to me , " I saw the sunset forty - four times ! "

tokens: and add-01 you love-01 one sunset sad-02 one so late more little
sent_text: And a little later you added : " You know -- one loves the sunset , when one is so sad ... "

tokens: sad-02 interrogative you then so
sent_text: " Were you so sad , then ? "

tokens: ask-01 i be-temporally-at-91 interrogative day have-03 sunset 44
sent_text: I asked , " on the day of the forty - four sunsets ? "

tokens: contrast-01 reply-01 - prince little
sent_text: But the little prince made no reply .
